name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Data Engineer with over 10 years of expertise in leveraging **Python** for data modeling and ETL processes within financial platforms. Proficient in implementing **Azure DevOps** and CI/CD practices to ensure seamless data integration and deployment. Skilled in developing real-time customer data platforms and optimized databases utilizing **SQL** and **Unix-Scripting**. Extensive experience with cloud technologies, particularly **Azure**, to design scalable architectures. Proven ability to translate complex banking requirements into efficient and effective data solutions, contributing to successful projects at leading organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Fluent in English, enhancing collaboration in diverse teams.
